trans-unit.source: Login / Sign up with a Vibent account
trans-unit.target: Login / Sign up with a Vibent account

trans-unit.source: Keep connected with your friends, colleagues or family and organize together in a group.
trans-unit.target: Keep connected with your friends, colleagues or family and organize together in a group.

trans-unit.source: An outing, a birthday or a special event? Create events in one of your groups.
trans-unit.target: An outing, a birthday or a special event? Create events in one of your groups.

trans-unit.source: Allow everyone to help organize, by seeing all contributions in real time.
trans-unit.target: Allow everyone to help organize, by seeing all contributions in real time.

trans-unit.source: An event is composed of multiple bubbles. Each bubble has a type and each type allows you to organize a specific aspect of your event. In a bubble, everyone is a participant and can contribute.
trans-unit.target: An event is composed of multiple bubbles. Each bubble has a type and each type allows you to organize a specific aspect of your event. In a bubble, everyone is a participant and can contribute.

trans-unit.source: Click on each one to see details about it
trans-unit.target: Click on each one to see details about it

trans-unit.source: Indicate what you plan to bring, ask participants to bring other food and drinks. Manage supplies for the event to make sure you don't miss out on anything!
trans-unit.target: Indicate what you plan to bring, ask participants to bring other food and drinks. Manage supplies for the event to make sure you don't miss out on anything!

trans-unit.source: Make a list of things to do, plan or organize for the event. Participants will be able to check one or more elements of the list.
trans-unit.target: Make a list of things to do, plan or organize for the event. Participants will be able to check one or more elements of the list.

trans-unit.source: Organize the planning for your event. Specify what, when and where you have planned for the event.
trans-unit.target: Organize the planning for your event. Specify what, when and where you have planned for the event.

trans-unit.source: Help participants organize their travelling plans to the event! Some people will be able to offer seats in their cars, and others will be able to ask to be picked up.
trans-unit.target: Help participants organize their travelling plans to the event! Some people will be able to offer seats in their cars, and others will be able to ask to be picked up.

trans-unit.source: For anything else you might have to say about the event, you can use a free bubble where anything goes.
trans-unit.target: For anything else you might have to say about the event, you can use a free bubble where anything goes.

trans-unit.source: Conduct a survey to get feedback from participants on a specific issue.
trans-unit.target: Conduct a survey to get feedback from participants on a specific issue.

trans-unit.source: Removing group will cause all child events and resources to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Removing group will cause all child events and resources to be removed.

trans-unit.source: By clicking on "Reset Password" we will send you a password reset link
trans-unit.target: By clicking on "Reset Password" we will send you a password reset link

trans-unit.source: You can register with your email or your phone. Or even both!
trans-unit.target: You can register with your email or your phone. Or even both!

trans-unit.source: By clicking on Sign Up, you agree to our Terms and Conditions
trans-unit.target: By clicking on Sign Up, you agree to our Terms and Conditions

trans-unit.source: There is no event in this group. You can create one by clicking on the button just above. Group members can then participate and help you organize
trans-unit.target: There is no event in this group. You can create one by clicking on the button just above. Group members can then participate and help you organize

trans-unit.source: You're an admin, you can change the group settings and manage membership requests here
trans-unit.target: You're an admin, you can change the group settings and manage membership requests here

trans-unit.source: You're an admin, you can change the event settings here
trans-unit.target: You're an admin, you can change the event settings here

trans-unit.target: Copyright Â© Vibent. All rights reserved
